reviews.review: play it play it play it its so good

Eu já zerei ele antes, mas fiz questão de pagar pra jogar essa obra prima. As piadas de humor duvidoso, a jogabilidade, o carisma dos personagens, a jogabilidade, a ambientação e uma trilha sonora que faz vc se sentir um rato de laboratório. nota 2/10
Hillariously entertaining, especially when your better half inadvertently throws you into water or squishes you with moving boxes xD
I miss my robot wife Valve. Please bring her back.

This game is truly amazing. If you are looking for a good single-player experience full of story and sarcasm then this is it. I promise you that if you get this game then you will enjoy it. I would make sure I know the ending to the first game before you play this.
Очень классная игра как в одиночном прохождении так и в кооперативе
Puzzels are a lot harder than the origanal but thats why i like it also the little british robot is poggers

This game is so good with the lighting and story. Portal is decade breaking and so amazing it is my favourite game of all time with its characters and sound and design. Would Recommend its amazing and i have about 530 hours in it and its a story game. So well designed if you see this then please play this game its not free but for good reason. Absolute masterpiece of a game that is in top 10 best games of all time so fun and enjoyable. In conclusion, this game is so good and play it now because it will be such a fun time.
damn dude this game is poggers for everything. puzzles, story, workshop, it's just sheesh.

to make it short: I love the game because of the ability to create own Testchambers. I also like the fact that the game continues with the chapter "the fall" but I honestly thought the game was over.

oyun cidden bulmaca oyunu olmasının hakkını veriyor Ama hareketli kısımlarda var sadece bulmaca değil hatta bir kısımlarda savaşıyorsunuz çok güzel oyunun tam çözüm videolarını falan izlemeniz gerekebiliyor çünkü bazen "YUH!" dedirten bölümleri var. Sonuç olarak güzel ve iki kere bitirdim.

Amazing game, story line, soundtrack, graphics, everything!

Portal 2 is a modern masterpiece, it improves over the first game in nearly every single way, while also creating an interesting story through the game. One thing I think the first game did better in my opinion was the sense of isolation, but nonetheless, Portal 2 is near perfect.

This was a triumph i making a note here HUGE SUCCESS It's hard to overstate my satisfaction Aperture Science we do what we most because we can For the good of all of us Execpt for ones who are dead but theres no sense crying over evrey mistake you just keep on trying till you run out of cake read the science geta done and you will make a neat gum for the people who are still alive !!!!!!
Good game! Co-op mode is fun if you have someone to play along with. There are easy as well as challenging levels to keep you busy. :)

i like puzzles. puzzles are fun

Oyun güzel fakat bazı yerler zorlayıcı ve sürekli aynı tür mekanlarda bulunmak canınızı sıkıyor.Mesela portal 1'de o mekanların değişimini hissedebiliyorsunuz ama burası sanki hep aynı yere geliyormuşuz gibi.Onun dışında bazı müzikler kulak tırmalayan cinsten olmuş.Başka bir sıkıntısı yok.Güzel detaylar var,bazı yerlerde heyecanı yaşıyorsunuz,duygu değişimleri yaşıyorsunuz.Genel olarak anlattığım sorunlar oyunun genel yapısını çok etkilemeyecek düzeyde olduğu için tavsiye ediyorum.
по сравнению с портал эта игра просто идеальна особенно сюжетка с 2 игроками
good puzzles and good plot with funky characters

Одна и тех игр которую должны купить все!
Раньше я никогда не увлекался подобным и даже смотреть не было интересно на эту игру, но как я попробовал эту игру я сразу понял, что должен её купить.(что уже сделал) В этой игре всё является головоломкой, но крайне интересных! За всю игру я не разу не заскучал, конечно были моменты когда я задерживался, но иначе это не было так интересно.
Всем советую!
Awsome game. Good humor. Good levels.

Game is way too fun with all the puzzles.  However,

[spoiler] There is a bug in Chapter 8, chamber 15, where you cannot move the cube . Make sure to save a lot so that you can re-load a previous save. Always make a fresh save after each chamber [/spoiler]
Played about half the campain but gave up cause it is super difficult on some levels. Certainly worth picking it up if it ever goes on the $3 sale again. 7/10
